scripts.start: rm -rf node_modules/app; mkdir node_modules/app; rm -rf lib; babel src --out-dir lib; ln -s ../../lib/base node_modules/app/base;ln -s ../../lib/core node_modules/app/core;ln -s ../../lib/module node_modules/app/module;node lib/index.js
scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules/app; mkdir node_modules/app; rm -rf lib; babel src --out-dir lib; ln -s ../../lib/base node_modules/app/base;ln -s ../../lib/core node_modules/app/core;ln -s ../../lib/module node_modules/app/module
